title: Beautiful 2 bed / 2 bath in a great neighborhood! Ready to view now!
posting_body: ['Essex Apartments - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 2 / Bath: 2', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1791 sq ft', 'Rent: $3565 - $4516/Month', 'Terms: 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month', '(844) 800-3206', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'At Essex-Apartments you will enjoy a wonderful location in Peabody, MA.', 'Located just a few minutes from the beach, Essex is the perfect place to enjoy the wonderful outdoors.', 'Our apartments are also located right down the street from the Northshore Mall and plenty of great dining spots.', 'Our apartments feature private balconies or patios, central air-conditioning, sprawling closets and in-unit washer and dryers.', 'Residents can also take advantage of our unparalleled amenities, such as the landscaped barbecue and picnic area, playground and resort style pool.', 'Plus, come see our newly renovated clubhouse and fitness center!', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '− Ask Us About Our Hardwood Flooring!', '− Bright Spacious Floor Plans with 9 Foot or Vaulted Ceilings', '− Central Air Conditioning', '− Disability Access', '− Flexible Lease Terms Available', '− Fully-Equipped Kitchens Include Dishwashers and Breakfast Bars', '− Plush Wall to Wall Carpeting', '− Separate Dining Rooms In Select Apartments', '− Spacious Closets', '− Sustainable Apartment Plumbing Fixtures and HVAC Equipment', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '− 10 Minutes From the Coastline', '− 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '− Close to North Shore Mall', '− Easy Access to Maine', '− Easy Access to New Hampshire', '− High-speed WiFi Internet Available', '− Online Payments Available', '− On-Site Management Team', '− Pet-Friendly Community', '− Resident Clubhouse', '− Beautifully Landscaped Barbecue and Picnic Area', '− Community-Sponsored Social Events for Residents and Friends', '− Complimentary Package Acceptance Service', '− Free WiFi Available in Common Areas', '− Located Near Public Transportation', '− Smart Rain Sensors Used to Reduce Water Consumption', '− Sparkling Swimming Pool with Sundeck', '− State-of-the-Art Fitness Center with Cardio and Strength Equipment', '− Sustainable Lighting Techniques to Reduce Energy Consumption', 'Contact Info:', '(844) 800-3206', '1 Avalon Dr', 'Peabody, MA 01960', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Tue - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', '$500 Deposit.', '$75 Monthly Pet Rent.', '75 lb Weight Limit.', '2 Pet Limit.', 'Income must be at least three times the rent.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '4E577F5DD7044E7']
